amendment.description: To require a report on the consequences of failing to act on trade agreements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 650, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 147.

action.text: Amendment SA 650 proposed by Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S5857, S5866-5873, S5879; text: CR S5866-5867) To require a report on the consequences of failing to act on trade agreements.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 650, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 147.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 650, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 147.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 650 proposed by Senator Thune.
